post.author: 김태희
post.content:
.NET Web Developer

Gary Jonas Computing Ltd.



Location: Richmond Hill, ON, Canada



Jonas profile

Gary Jonas Computing Ltd was established in September 1990 with a mandate to be a client-oriented and technology-driven software application company with industry-related professionals.  Jonas is now recognized as an award-winning, premier provider of integrated systems for the Private and Semi-private Golf Clubs and Construction & Service Billing Industries in North America.



Jonas Software is a member of the Constellation family of companies. Constellation companies are leading developers of technology solutions for vertical markets in North America and Europe.   CSI won the prestigious “Canada’s 50 Best Managed Companies” award 2005 and in May 2006 became a publicly traded company on the Toronto Stock Exchange.



The Jonas workplace is dynamic, employing a motivated team that thrives on a fast-paced environment.  CSI group employees have the opportunity to move throughout the group, developing specialized skills and experience.



Opportunity



The .Net Web Developer career opportunity is for the CHO product development team within the Jonas/CSG organization and is responsible for developing interactive web applications for an important suite of online services.
post.title: .NET Web Developer
